true

Width in px, e.g. 1920
Height in px, e.g. 600
Slide transition, e.g. none
Slide transition time [ms]
Slide end animation: if set true, objects will transition out before next slide moves in
in - transition, e.g. left
out - transition, e.g. top
Transition over the full width of the window on/off
Delay for elements [ms]
Timeout before switching slides [ms]
in - transition speed [ms]
out - transition speed [ms]
Easing in, e.g. easeOutExpo
Easing out, e.g. easeOutCubic
Controls on/off
Pager inside of the slider on/off
Auto change slides on/off
Pauses slider on hover (current step will still be completed) on/off
Background animation on/off
Element to animate | default fractionSlider element
Background animation x distance
Background animation y distance
Background animation speed [ms]
Background animation easing, e.g. easeOutCubic
Responsive slider on/off
Increase: if set, slider is allowed to get bigger than basic dimensions
Width in px or %, e.g. 1920 or 100%
Height in px or %, e.g. 600 or 50%
Makes the slider responsive. 'width' and 'height' set: will act as the maximum width and height of the slides.
Sets the aspect ratio of the slides.
Sets the scale mode of the main slide images (images added as background).
Indicates if the image will be centered.
Indicates if the image can be scaled up more than its original size.
Indicates if height of the slider will be adjusted to the height of the selected slide.
Will maintain all the slides at the same height...
Sets the slide that will be selected when the slider loads.
Indicates if the slides will be shuffled.
Indicates whether the slides will be arranged horizontally or vertically.
Indicates if the size of the slider will be forced to full width or full window.
Indicates if the slider will be loopable (infinite scrolling).
Sets the distance between the slides.
Sets the duration of the slide animation.
Sets the duration of the height animation.
Sets the size of the visible area, allowing for more slides to become visible near the selected slide.
Indicates whether the selected slide will be in the center [true] or the left [false] of the slider...
Indicates if the direction of the slider will be from right to left, instead of the default left to right.
Indicates if fade will be used.
Indicates if the previous slide will be faded out (in addition to the next slide being faded in).
Sets the duration of the fade effect. [ms]
Indicates whether or not autoplay will be enabled.
Sets the delay/interval at which the autoplay will run. [ms]
Indicates whether autoplay will navigate to the next slide or previous slide.
Indicates if the autoplay will be paused or stopped when the slider is hovered.
Indicates whether the arrow buttons will be created.
Indicates whether the arrows will fade in only on hover.
Indicates whether the buttons will be created.
Indicates whether keyboard navigation will be enabled.
Indicates whether the slider will respond to keyboard input only when the slider is in focus.
Indicates whether the touch swipe will be enabled for slides.
Sets the minimum amount that the slides should move.
Indicates whether or not the captions will be faded.
Sets the duration of the fade animation. [ms]
Indicates whether the full-screen button is enabled.
Indicates whether the button will fade in only on hover.
Indicates whether the slider will wait for the layers to disappear before going to a new slide.
Indicates whether the layers will be scaled automatically.
Sets a reference width which will be compared to the current slider width...
If the slider size is below this size, the small version of the images will be used.
If the slider size is below this size, the medium version of the images will be used.
If the slider size is below this size, the large version of the images will be used.
Indicates whether the hash will be updated when a new slide is selected.
Sets the action that the video will perform when its slide container is selected.
Sets the action that the video will perform when another slide is selected.
Sets the action that the slider will perform when the video starts playing.
Sets the action that the slider will perform when the video is paused.
Sets the action that the slider will perform when the video ends.
Sets the width of the thumbnail.
Sets the height of the thumbnail.
Sets the position of the thumbnail scroller.
Indicates if a pointer will be displayed for the selected thumbnail.
Indicates whether the thumbnail arrows will be enabled.
Indicates whether the thumbnail arrows will be faded.
Indicates whether the touch swipe will be enabled for thumbnails.
Duration for one slide [ms]
Width of the grid [px]
Height of the grid [px]
Disable progress bar?
